title: MarCielo 3 Piece 100% White Cotton Quilt Set Lightweight, White Cotton Bedspread (King)
features: GOOD ABSORBENCY & PERMEABILITY: 100% NATURAL COTTON . Excellent performance with no skin irritation, hygroscopic, ventilative, anti-static. So soft and comfortable for bed and sofa decoration, Good quality for your skin and health sleep.
ACTIVE PRINTING: The 3 Piece Quilted COTTON Quilts Bedspread adopt pure natural mineral or vegetable dyes, featured high color fastness and fine pattern, non-fading.
MULTI-USE QUILTS BEDSPREADS: Luxury Elegant Finely Stitched, Soft Touch Quilt Bedspread Set. Can be used as bed coverlets, air condition quilt, thickened sheet, decorative accessories, sofa blanket.
EASY CARE: Machine Wash in Cold Water with Similar Colors. Tumble Dry on Low Heat. Do Not Bleach, no Ironing
WHAT YOU GET: KING SIZE 1PC quilt(106" X 98"), 2PCS pillow shams(20" X 36").Oversize for better coverage on today's deeper mattresses, Suitable for King Size.
description: Bring a touch of class into your Bedroom with this luxurious quilted COTTON bedspread set.
Decorate your bedroom with those 3pcs fully quilted quilts bedspread, and update your home decor with the Luxurious quilted bed coverlets.

100% NATURAL COTTON. Excellent performance with no skin irritation, hygroscopic, ventilative, anti-static. So soft and comfortable for bed and sofa decoration, Good quality for your skin and health sleep.
The 3 Piece Quilted Quilts Bedspread adopt pure natural mineral or vegetable dyes, featured high color fastness and fine pattern, non-fading.
Can be used as bed coverlets, air condition quilt, thickened sheet, decorative accessories, sofa blanket.
Machine wash in cold water with similar colors. Tumble dry on low heat. Do not bleach, no ironing.
1PC Quilt(98" X 102")  2PC Pillow Shams(20" X 26")  It can fix Queen size bed. OR 1PC Quilt(112" X 102")  2PC Pillow Shams(20" X 36")  It can fix king size bed.
